Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an unauthorized person on the tracks near Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an unauthorized person on the tracks near Cermak.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
